item.title: CodeIgniter img update
item.description:
It‚Äôs been a while since my library CodeIgniter img was updated. Purpose of this library is pretty clear ‚Äì to scale images on the fly using CodeIgniter. It‚Äôs very useful in all kinds of website and CMS-like projects. All you need to do, is just load library and inside view use it like that

$this->img->rimg('path/to/image.jpg', array('width' => 100, 'height' => 200, 'alt'='my awesome image'));

First time when script hits image, will create thumbnail. Next time, website will get already scaled image. If you need change dimensions, just change it within view ‚Äì don‚Äôt worry about recreating images.
